unnormalised: Okay, mhunnllear, tumi insurance gheunk sochotat kai? Borem kelem! Tem ek surekshit zalnni bhaxen asa ji tumkam kednanch zai naso, punn jea vellar vostu bhairi poddttat tedna tumi sasnnik dhanyavadit zatat, barobar? Mhaka dista konnacheakuch apghatacho vichar korunk zainam vo Devak dista, khoro aslear jivon Bumrah yorker-von vegim curveball martaa.
normalised: Borem, tumi insurance gheunchea babtint vichar kortat, hã? Borem kelem! Tem ek suraksha jallem bhaxen, tumi kitem korunk zai mhunn mhunnun tuka kednanch zai poddonam, punn vostu kharab zatat tedna tumi sasnnak kritgone asat, boro? Mhaka mhunnchem, konnakuch apghatam vixim vo Devak khobor asa ki kharab vixim vichar korunk nam zai, punn vastavik rupan, Bumrah yorker-achea poros vegim jivit curveball fattim dita.

unnormalised: Khorem mhunnllear, puro insuranceacho vixoy chikhalantlean cholun vochpa bhaxen distaa. Khup. Soglea. Options. Ani sogllea jargonnachem? Sheesh. Tumkam ULIPs, endowment policies, term plans asat... tem tumchem mathheak ek dervish-von vegim bhonvddeunk lavpa bhaxen asta. Kitem kompani sovem vochchem tem sodhun kaddopui ek mission asa. HDFC Life, ICICI Prudential, Bajaj Allianz... te sogle boreach uzo kaddttat mhunn dista.
normalised: Chali, soglle insurance vostu dhol-achea bhitor chollea bhaxen disunk xokta. Kiteak mhonnlear. Zaite. Vikalp. Ani sogllem te jargon? Shish. Tumchea kodden U-L-I-P-s, endowment policies, term plans asat...tem tumchea matheak dervish-achem poros vegim bhonvta koruncheak purnn asa. Kitem kompnik gheunchea babtint vochunk zai tem vichar korop ek mission asa. H-D-F-C Life, I-C-I-C-I Prudential, Bajaj Allianz… te sogllem unchch swarant ulo maritat bhaxen dista.

unnormalised: Poile suvater, tumkam khoreponnim kitem zai tem sodhun kadda. Tumi ekloch kamai korpi asat kai? Magir ek boro sum assured aslolem term plan tumchea khatir borem asta. Tacho vichar kora: tumchea familyak tumi asonam zalear jievon sambhallonk kitlem zai aslem? Ek rough estimate tumchea vorsuki income-cho at least 10x astolo. Mhozo chacha bhaxen koni, tannem ek crore policy ghettli kiteak tannem don bhurgim ani ek mortgage asa.
normalised: Poilech, tumkam vastav rupan kitem zai tem vichar korat. Tumi ekuch anna divpi asat? Magir ek bori sum assured asa to term plan tumchea boreantlo ek ut'tom marg asa. Tacho vichar korat: tumi ithe naslear tumchea kutumbak tanchem jivit pod'dot sambhallunk kitlem zai aslem? Ek dol'leacho andazo mhunnchear tumchi vorsuki utponnachi sumar dha pautti asteli. Mhojea chacha bhaxen konn, tannem ek crore policy ghetele kiteak tannem dog bhurgem ani mortgage asa.

unnormalised: Endowment policies... atam te veglo. Te ek jivoch rakshonn gheun forssan kel'lea savings bhaxen astat. Fuddarak corpus bandunk borem, tumchea bhurgeanchea education vo retirement bhaxen. Punn ugddas dhorat, pure investment options bhaxen mutual funds-von returns borech unne astat. Tem ek "safe" option mhunn vichar kora.
normalised: Endowment policies… atam tem vegllem asat. Te jivitachem zogat uloiuncheachea sangata zabordosti zoddnni bhaxen asat. Fuddarak ek corpus bandunk borem, tumchea bhurgeanchem xikxonn vo nivrutti bhaxen. Punn ugddas dovrat, mutual funds bhaxen sud'd investment vikalpachem poros returns tankam bori na. Tem ek "surakxit" vikalp mhunn vichar korat.

unnormalised: Ani magir tumkam ULIPs asat. Unit Linked Insurance Plans. Hi suvater insurance stock marketak melltta. Tumche dolleanche kitem jivoch rakshonna khatir vochta ani kitem market-linked funds-ant invest zata. High risk, high reward, mhunn sangtat. Tumi tornatte aslear ani tumkam thodi volatility tankonk zatali zalear, te sodunk zata. Punn *kednach* tumchem research kora. Tumcho "ixtt" ek financial advisor mhunn tumi tatkalik vochonant!
normalised: Ani magir tumchea kodden U-L-I-P-s asat. Unit Linked Insurance Plans. Him zaga insurance stock marketa sangata melltta. Tumchea poixeacho ek bhag jivit zogat uloiuncheak veta, ani ek bhag market-linked funds-an investment korunk veta. Unch jokhem, unch inam, te uloupant mhunntat. Tumi tarun asat ani tumkam thoddi asthirtai pettunk xokta zalear, te eke nodrek favo zatat. Punn tumchem sod korunk kednanch visrunakat. Tumcho "ixtt" ek financial advisor asa mhunnun bhitor soddonakat!

unnormalised: Health insurance visoronant! Hospital bills Mumbai-nt property prices-von vegim vaddttat mhunn ek borem health policy zaroori asta. Tem ek sodhat je pre-existing conditions cover kortaa (waiting period-ant, of course), cashless hospitalization ditaa ani ek borem claim settlement ratio asta. Hanvem Star Health vixim bori vostu aikollea.
normalised: Arogya insurance visarunk nam! Mumbai-ant property mol poros vegim vodtloli hospitalachem billam sangata, ek bori arogya policy non-negotiable asa. Tem poilim-thawn asa ti sthiti (watt polloupi kall zalea uprant, khorench), cashless hospital-an vochunk favo karta, ani ek bori claim settlement ratio asa to khoz. Mhaka Star Health vixim boreo vostu aikuk ailea.

unnormalised: Kednach quotes compare korat! Tumchea Google search-ant yetli ti poili policy gheun vochonant. Policybazaar ani Coverfox bhaxen websites tumkam vegvegllea kompanichea vegvegllea plans compare korunk ditat. Tem Linking Road-ant sarees gheupa bhaxen asta - tumi bore deal khatir haggle kortat!
normalised: Kednanch quotes tulnat! Google sodant aileli poili policy gheunk nam vochat. Policybazaar ani Coverfox bhaxen websites tumkam veg-vegllea company-an thawn veg-vegllea yojnanchi tulna korunk ditat. Tem Linking Road-ant sarees-a khatir dukana korpa bhaxen- tum bori deal gheuncheak haggling kortat!

unnormalised: Fine print vachat. Mhaka khobor asa, tem borek ditaa, punn tem zaroori asa. Exclusions, waiting periods ani claims process-ak dixtt dhorat. Tumkam zai tedna tumcho claim deny zal'lo tumkam zai naslo. Tem IKEA bookshelf assemble korche poilim instructions vachpa bhaxen asa - dukkhavaddpi, punn zaroori.
normalised: Umedichi chhapi vachat. Mhaka khobor asa, tem borek lagona, punn tem atiavashyak asa. Exclusions, watt pollouncheachem kall, ani claim procrutant dhyan divat. Zevnnachea sarti asunk zai tumkam zanna tumchea claims-an vochonk poddta tedna tem mhaka zai nam mhunnun mhaka dista. Tem I-K-E-A bookshelf zoma korchea poilim suchovnneo vachopa bhaxen- trasachee, punn zaroori.

unnormalised: Tumkam somzonk naslelea vostunchea khatir pressure ghevonant. Thoim dhog dhoge agents asat je tumkam bori policy sodhuntlean commission kamovnk chodd dixtt ditat. Tumi tumcho vell gheiat, prashn vicharat ani kitem borem disona zalear soddun vochat.
normalised: Tumi somzonam asat kitem tumi gheunk zai poddonastam ddbau gheunk zai nam. Thodde agents asat zaite thavn, tumi bori policy sodun gheunk modot korchea poros commission kamoucheak chintun asat. Tumcho vell gheiat, prashn ucharaat, ani kitem tori sarvochch dista zalear, bhair vochat.

unnormalised: Ani nimanneak, ugddas dhorat ki insurance ek shantiche investiment asa. Tem vegim girest zaunk na. Tem tumkam ani tumchea mogachea lokank anapekshit vostuncheantle rakhoonk asa. Mhunn, ek lamb swas gheat, tumchem homework kora ani tumchea needs ani budget-ak fit asa ti policy vinchun kadda. Magir, relaks zaun tumchi chai enjoy kora, zannan ki tumkam ek safety net thaun asa.
normalised: Ani nimannem, ugddas dovrat ki insurance to ek monxachea monak xanti divpi investment asa. Tem vegim girest zaunchea vixim na. Tem tumkam ani tumchea mogachea monxank achankit zaunk poddtta thawn samballchea vixim asa. Tori tumchea monant thoddos shwas gheiat, tumchea ghara-karya korat, ani tumchi garjek bori poddtta ani budget-ant vochun dita ti policy vinchun kaddat. Magir, shant rav ani tumchi chai piyiat, tumchea kodden ek suraksha jallem ithe mhunnun tumkam khobor asa.
